title.narrative: PROGRAMME PLANNING AND MONITORING

description.narrative: UNICEF staff and partners are provided guidance, tools and resources to effectively plan and monitor programmes, which contributes to Cross-Sectoral - Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Cross-Sectoral - Planning And Programme Reviews, Cross-Sectoral Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Cross-Sectoral Planning And Programme Reviews, Evaluation, Research. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Data, Research, Evaluation And Knowledge Management, Evaluations, Research And Data, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: PROGRAMME EFFECTIVENESS

participating-org.narrative: MINISTERIO DO TRABALHO SOLIDARIEDAD FAMILIA E PROTECAO SOCIAL

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: UNICEF staff and partners are provided guidance, tools and resources to effectively plan and monitor programmes

description.narrative: Most key planning as well as internal and external reporting deadlines were met and efforts to improve reporting continued. UNICEF made good progress on HACT planning and assurance activities, considering the difficulties to keep up with assurance activities during the COVID-19 emergency.; | Status:On-track | As-of Date:25/01/2022
